team21.Cloudy

Class SwingUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • team21.Cloudy.SwingUtils

  • public class SwingUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of utility methods for various stuff with swing applications.
    Author:
    Aurelien Ribon | http://www.aurelienribon.com

    • Constructor Detail

      • SwingUtils

        public SwingUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • createDialogBackPanel

        public static void createDialogBackPanel(javax.swing.JDialog dialog,
                                         java.awt.Component parent)
        Centers the dialog over the given parent component. Also, creates a semi-transparent panel behind the dialog to mask the parent content. The title of the dialog is displayed in a custom fashion over the dialog panel, and a rectangular shadow is placed behind the dialog.

      • addEscapeToCloseSupport

        public static void addEscapeToCloseSupport(javax.swing.JDialog dialog,
                                           boolean fadeOnClose)
        Adds a glass layer to the dialog to intercept all key events. If the espace key is pressed, the dialog is disposed (either with a fadeout animation, or directly).

      • fadeIn

        public static void fadeIn(javax.swing.JDialog dialog)
        Creates an animation to fade the dialog opacity from 0 to 1.

      • fadeOut

        public static void fadeOut(javax.swing.JDialog dialog)
        Creates an animation to fade the dialog opacity from 1 to 0.
